column4: I installed XGL/Compiz on my computer yesterday,  I've always had checkgmail running up in my upper corner.  Everytime I get an email and I click on the delete option, it doesn't do anything.  If I switch over to Metacity I can click on it and delete it.  Anyone know way to fix this so I can use checkgmail while running Compiz
I believe all Nvidia cards work with linux
you need to exclude the app from using compiz, it cant be done, let me see if i can remember
